<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorFunc"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeColorFunc

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A [Color](Color.md) function to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Accept a [Color](Color.md) to the input port and transform it according to [function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_property_function).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Function**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function)

<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_constant_FUNC_GRAYSCALE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function) **FUNC_GRAYSCALE** = `0`

Converts the color to grayscale using the following formula:

```
    vec3 c = input;
    float max1 = max(c.r, c.g);
    float max2 = max(max1, c.b);
    float max3 = max(max1, max2);
    return vec3(max3, max3, max3);
```
<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_constant_FUNC_HSV2RGB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function) **FUNC_HSV2RGB** = `1`

Converts HSV vector to RGB equivalent.<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_constant_FUNC_RGB2HSV"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function) **FUNC_RGB2HSV** = `2`

Converts RGB vector to HSV equivalent.<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_constant_FUNC_SEPIA"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function) **FUNC_SEPIA** = `3`

Applies sepia tone effect using the following formula:

```
    vec3 c = input;
    float r = (c.r * 0.393) + (c.g * 0.769) + (c.b * 0.189);
    float g = (c.r * 0.349) + (c.g * 0.686) + (c.b * 0.168);
    float b = (c.r * 0.272) + (c.g * 0.534) + (c.b * 0.131);
    return vec3(r, g, b);
```
<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_constant_FUNC_LINEAR_TO_SRGB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function) **FUNC_LINEAR_TO_SRGB** = `4`

Converts color from linear color space to sRGB color space using the following formula:

```
    vec3 c = clamp(c, vec3(0.0), vec3(1.0));
    const vec3 a = vec3(0.055f);
    return mix((vec3(1.0f) + a) * pow(c.rgb, vec3(1.0f / 2.4f)) - a, 12.92f * c.rgb, lessThan(c.rgb, vec3(0.0031308f)));
```


The Compatibility renderer uses a simpler formula:

```
    vec3 c = input;
    return max(vec3(1.055) * pow(c, vec3(0.416666667)) - vec3(0.055), vec3(0.0));
```
<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_constant_FUNC_SRGB_TO_LINEAR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function) **FUNC_SRGB_TO_LINEAR** = `5`

Converts color from sRGB color space to linear color space using the following formula:

```
    vec3 c = input;
    return mix(pow((c.rgb + vec3(0.055)) * (1.0 / (1.0 + 0.055)), vec3(2.4)), c.rgb * (1.0 / 12.92), lessThan(c.rgb, vec3(0.04045)));
```


The Compatibility renderer uses a simpler formula:

```
    vec3 c = input;
    return c * (c * (c * 0.305306011 + 0.682171111) + 0.012522878);
```
<a id="VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_constant_FUNC_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function) **FUNC_MAX** = `6`

Represents the size of the [Function](VisualShaderNodeColorFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeColorFunc_Function) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>
